…Mr. Speaker, I rise today in strong support of S. 1071,  the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2026. I thank my  friend, colleague, and ranking member,  Don Norcross, for all of his  great work on this effort.

This year, the NDAA placed an extraordinary emphasis on overhauling  the acquisition process, shifting focus from compliance to…

(DCI); Norling, Richard: ABC       NEWS; Norris, Courtney: PBS NewsHour; Norris, Donna:…

…commercial data feeds to more accurately detect, identify, and track  UAS incursions near military installations.

Madam Chair, I thank the subcommittee's ranking member,  Don  Norcross, for his leadership in these efforts and for his shared,  bipartisan vision for our Nation's security.

Madam Chair, this year's NDAA is a strong, bipartisan bill that works…
